original_text: We taught you clearly what is true. We helped you to be strong as believers. God has chosen you to be his own people. You belong to his great kingdom, where he rules. So we told you to live in a way that pleases him.
korean_text: 이는 너희를 부르사 자기 나라와 영광에 이르게 하시는 하나님께 합당히 행하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: We taught you clearly what is true
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 너희에게 진리인 것을 명확히 가르쳤다

sentences.original_text: We helped you to be strong as believers
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 믿는 자로서 강하게 되도록 도왔다

sentences.original_text: God has chosen you to be his own people
You belong to his great kingdom
So we told you to live in a way that pleases him
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 우리는 그를 기쁘시게 하는 방식으로 살라고 너희에게 말했다
